# Aditya Puri

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jump to navigation Jump to search

**Aditya Puri** is the Managing Director of [HDFC Bank](/wiki/HDFC_Bank "HDFC
Bank"), India's largest private sector bank.[1][2] He assumed this position in
September 1994, making him the longest-serving head of any private bank in the
country.[3] _[India Today](/wiki/India_Today "India Today")_ magazine ranked
him #24th in India's 50 Most Powerful People of 2017 list.[4]

## Contents

  * 1 Biography
  * 2 Career
  * 3 Awards and honours
    * 3.1 2016
    * 3.2 2015
    * 3.3 2013
  * 4 Personal life
  * 5 References

##
Biography[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Aditya_Puri&action=edit&section=1&editintro=Template:BLP_editintro
"Edit section: Biography")]

Aditya Puri was born in [Gurdaspur](/wiki/Gurdaspur "Gurdaspur") District
(Punjab) and studied at [Punjab University,
Chandigarh](/wiki/Punjab_University,_Chandigarh "Punjab University,
Chandigarh"), gaining a bachelor's degree in Commerce. He qualified as a
[Chartered Accountant](/wiki/Chartered_Accountant "Chartered Accountant") with
the [Institute of Chartered Accountants of
India](/wiki/Institute_of_Chartered_Accountants_of_India "Institute of
Chartered Accountants of India").

##
Career[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Aditya_Puri&action=edit&section=2&editintro=Template:BLP_editintro
"Edit section: Career")]

He has worked in the banking sector for 40 years, in India and other
countries, and became CEO of [Citibank](/wiki/Citibank "Citibank"),
[Malaysia](/wiki/Malaysia "Malaysia") in 1992. In September 1994 he returned
to India as Managing Director of HDFC Bank.[1][5]

He presided over HDFC's acquisitions of [Times
Bank](/w/index.php?title=Times_Bank&action=edit&redlink=1 "Times Bank \(page
does not exist\)") Limited in 2000 and of [Centurion Bank of
Punjab](/wiki/Centurion_Bank_of_Punjab "Centurion Bank of Punjab") in
2008.[1][6]

## Awards and
honours[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Aditya_Puri&action=edit&section=3&editintro=Template:BLP_editintro
"Edit section: Awards and honours")]

###
2016[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Aditya_Puri&action=edit&section=4&editintro=Template:BLP_editintro
"Edit section: 2016")]

  * He was the only Indian to feature in _Fortune_ 's Businessperson of the Year list.[7][8]
  * Best CEO: Institutional Investor All-Asia Executive Team ranking 2016[9]
  * Outstanding Business Leader of the year-CNBC-TV18 India Business Leader Awards (IBLA) 2015-16[9]
  * FE Lifetime Achievement Award from Financial Express[9][10]
  * Barron's World's Top 30 CEOs[9][11]

###
2015[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Aditya_Puri&action=edit&section=5&editintro=Template:BLP_editintro
"Edit section: 2015")]

  * Best CEO Award - Business Today[9]
  * Business Leader of the Year - AIMA Managing India Awards 2015[9]
  * World's 30 Best CEOs - Barron's[9]
  * Best CEO- Finance Asia poll on Asia's Best Companies 2015[9]

###
2013[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Aditya_Puri&action=edit&section=6&editintro=Template:BLP_editintro
"Edit section: 2013")]

  * Best Executive in India - Asiamoney[9]
  * Banker of the Year 2013 - Business Standard[9]
  * Best CEO - Institutional Investor[9]
  * Top Achiever - Sunday Standard Best Banker Awards[9]
  * Best Executive in India - Asia Money 2013Best Banker - FE[9]

## Personal
life[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Aditya_Puri&action=edit&section=7&editintro=Template:BLP_editintro
"Edit section: Personal life")]

He is the father of actress [Amrita Puri](/wiki/Amrita_Puri "Amrita
Puri").[12]

nq_1048_0.Document and Query Keywords Matching: The document includes the keywords 'Aditya Puri', 'Managing Director', and 'HDFC Bank'.

nq_1048_0.Key Information Matching: The document directly states that Aditya Puri is the Managing Director of HDFC Bank, which is the key information required by the query.
nq_1048_0.Can the Document Answer the Query: Yes, the document directly answers the query by stating Aditya Puri's position.
nq_1048_0.Can the Document Help Infer Additional I: Yes, the document provides additional context about Aditya Puri's career and tenure, enhancing the understanding of his role.
nq_1048_0.Explanation: The document is highly relevant as it directly answers the query by confirming Aditya Puri as the Managing Director of HDFC Bank. Additionally, it provides valuable context about his career and tenure, which enriches the information related to the query.
